code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/KennsCarlo/Desktop/budget-tracker-v1/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";var contextReducer=function contextReducer(state,action){var transactions;switch(action.type){case"DELETE_TRANSACTION":transactions=state.filter(function(transaction){return transaction.id!==action.payload;});localStorage.setItem("transactions",JSON.stringify(transactions));return transactions;case"ADD_TRANSACTION":transactions=[action.payload].concat(_toConsumableArray(state));localStorage.setItem("transactions",JSON.stringify(transactions));return transactions;default:return state;}};export default contextReducer;
